page.title: 10ASHWREN DRAMA GROUP
page.content:
{Amateur Drama, why do it? It's fun! Anyone,any age,can join in. We get to- gether a group, choose a producer and a play, cast it, choose a prompt and rehearse. First in our homes, then in our Village Hall, weekly at first then more often;then the week prior to per- formance - nightly (and in our sleep).
We have our words on tape, nerves on edge & work cut out as we also build, decorate & light the set. Do sound effects, props, costumes, make-up & publicity. Sell tickets & remember to book the Hall in advance. We man the door, set up the chairs, do the raffle & sweep the floor. A dress rehearsal if it is bad, can only get better! Finally, at last we're on!{Applause! {Laughter! Congratulations! Photos! {Party! Do it again? Of course.
